Our SaaS platform enables direct, perpetual and privacy-friendly connection.

descriptions.fr:
PELICO reflects how AI is transforming industrial operations. Our SAAS Solution aims at bridging the gap between the operational issues of industrial fields and Technology thanks to smart data.

We empower factory teams with the agility required to manage daily volatility and deliver products on time, at cost. Our factory operations management system enables teams to continuously anticipate parts shortages, act fast with AI-assisted recommendations, and collaborate across teams on the implementation of corrective actions. 

Since our creation in 2019, we are focused on the ways to reach outcomes by  implementing impactful action plans based on real-time operations planning data. Customers like Safran and Collins Aerospace are able within 10 weeks of deployment to reduce their parts shortages by 37%, increase their on-time deliveries by 15% and reduce their MRO cycle times by 42%.

We are sponsored by European investors & Business angels that accompany us in funds raising. We are now ready to scale and build confidence with our ecosystem.

descriptions.en:
TiHive believes that every person has the right to a high quality of living. This is why TiHive puts its high-tech innovations to help the world produce products with positive- impact and friendly to the environment. TiHive is building the coolest technology that sees and understands the invisible.

The TiHive team has invented a better version of the superman vision and augmented it with brains of R2-D2. It is called T-Rays to see the invisible safely (unlike X-Rays), and AI to understand it ;-).
